CustomField.description: Rollup count of deceased contacts related to the Account. Used in "All Constituents Deceased checkbox" formula field. Rolled up using DLRS action named: 'Count Deceased Contacts on Account'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Rollup count of deceased contacts related to the Account. Used in "All Constituents Deceased checkbox" formula field. Rolled up using DLRS action named: 'Count Deceased Contacts on Account'.
CustomField.label: Number of Deceased Contacts
